actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1715 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978 to prohibit take-or-pay clauses, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978 to prohibit take-or-pay and indefinite price escalator clauses, subject to stated exceptions. Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to deny a pipeline's request for a cost passthrough if the Commission determines that the costs were imprudently incurred by the pipeline.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978 to prohibit take-or-pay clauses, and for other purposes.
